resources.string: Hey, I\'m Malik LAFIA, a passionate and driven developer motivated by creating and enhancing various projects. You earned your high school diploma in 2018 in Benin and a Bachelor\'s degree in Information Systems with highest honors in 2022 in Dakar. You have experience in back-end and front-end development, particularly with Node.js, Angular, Symfony, and API Platform. Currently, you are seeking an apprenticeship and working on several projects, including a fitness tracking mobile application, with a methodical and innovative approach. I also have a strong interest in personal organization, developing diverse skill, (like Kotlin or CI/CD pipelines), and improving your physical and mental well-being. Your goal is to become the best version of yourself while sharing your journey with your audience on social media.
